DataElement.preferredName: Patient Systemic Immunosuppressive Therapy Administered Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: date related to patient receiving systemic immunosuppressive therapy

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Systemic Immunosuppressive Therapy Administered Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to whether the patient received systemic immunosuppressive therapy

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Systemic Immunosuppressive Therapy Administered Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Affecting the entire body.:deliberate suppression of immune system function for experimental or therapeutic purposes.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: deliberate suppression of immune system function for experimental or therapeutic purposes.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
